title: Kotak Bank, ICICI to offer banking on WhatsApp
content: Kotak Mahindra Bank chief digital officer Deepak Sharma said, “The familiarity and simplicity of the platform makes it easy for customers to interact with their bank and get answers to queries in a seamless and convenient manner.”
